title: Updated Note Processor constructors
details:
Both VideoNoteProcessor and PdfNoteProcessor constructors have been updated with new parameters:

VideoNoteProcessor constructor:
```csharp
public VideoNoteProcessor(
    ILogger<VideoNoteProcessor> logger, 
    IAISummarizer aiSummarizer, 
    IYamlHelper yamlHelper, 
    IMetadataHierarchyDetector hierarchyDetector,
    IMetadataTemplateManager templateManager,
    ICourseStructureExtractor courseStructureExtractor,
    MarkdownNoteBuilder markdownNoteBuilder,
    IOneDriveService? oneDriveService = null, 
    AppConfig? appConfig = null)
```

PdfNoteProcessor constructor:
```csharp
public PdfNoteProcessor(
    ILogger<PdfNoteProcessor> logger, 
    IAISummarizer aiSummarizer, 
    IYamlHelper yamlHelper, 
    IMetadataHierarchyDetector hierarchyDetector,
    IMetadataTemplateManager templateManager,
    ICourseStructureExtractor courseStructureExtractor,
    MarkdownNoteBuilder markdownNoteBuilder,
    IOneDriveService? oneDriveService = null, 
    AppConfig? appConfig = null)

Key changes from the old constructor:
1. Added `ICourseStructureExtractor courseStructureExtractor` parameter (required)
2. Added `MarkdownNoteBuilder markdownNoteBuilder` parameter (required)
3. The order of parameters has changed - markdownNoteBuilder comes after courseStructureExtractor
4. oneDriveService and appConfig remain optional parameters at the end

Tests need to be updated to provide mocks for these new required parameters.
